00042 const SimpleString& VariableAttribute::AccessToStr(VariableAccessType a)
00043 {
00044     if(a == ConstantAccess) return AccessConstantStr;
00045     if(a == ReadAccess) return AccessReadStr;
00046     return AccessReadWriteStr;
00047 }

00054 void VariableAttribute::GenerateShortDescription(SimpleString& str)
00055 {
00056     GenerateHeaderDescription(VariableStr, GetName(), str);

00058 
00059 void VariableAttribute::GenerateLongDescription(SimpleString& str)
00060 {
00061     GenerateHeaderDescription(VariableStr, GetName(), str, false);
00062 
00063     str += "<value>";
00064     PutAValueInCData(GetValue(), str);
00065     str += "</value>";
00066     if(defaultValue != "")
00067     {
00068         str += "<default>";
00069         PutAValueInCData(defaultValue, str);
00070         str += "</default>";
00071     }
00072 
00073     str = str + "<access>"+AccessToStr(access)+"</access>";
00074     str = str + "<type>"+type+"</type>";
00075     AddTagDescriptionToStr(str);
00076     str = str + "</variable>";
00077 }

00092 void VariableAttribute::Display()
00093 {
00094     printf("Name : %s\n", GetName().GetStr() );
00095     printf("Type : %s\n", type.GetStr());
00096     printf("Default Value : %s\n", defaultValue.GetStr());
00097     printf("Last Value : %s\n", valueStr.GetStr());
00098     printf("Access : %s\n", AccessToStr(access).GetStr());
00099 }

00102 void VariableAttribute::SetValue(const SimpleString value_str)
00103 {
00104     if ( valueStr == value_str )
00105     {
00106         // This appends when we remotely ask for a change
00107         // we were already notified that the value was changed
00108         // nothing to do, neither validate change nor change value
00109         return;
00110     }
00111 
00112     // ask to all listener if we can change the value
00113     SmartLocker SL_Listeners(Listeners);
00114 
00115     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00116     {
00117         VariableAttributeListener * pListener = Listeners.GetCurrent();
00118         if ( pListener->IsValid( this, value_str ) == false )
00119         {
00120             // OmiscidError( "VariableAttribute::SetValue: someone disagree on variable change\n");
00121             return;
00122         }
00123     }
00124 
00125     // Ok, change my value
00126     valueStr = value_str;
00127 
00128     // Initialised !!
00129     Initialised = true;
00130 
00131     // Ok the value has change, send information back to people
00132     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00133     {
00134         Listeners.GetCurrent()->VariableChanged( this );
00135     }
00136 }
00137 
00138 void VariableAttribute::SetValueFromControl(const SimpleString value_str)
00139 {
00140     if ( valueStr == value_str )
00141     {
00142         // This appends when we ask for a change without validation
00143         // and e ask for several time to change to the same value
00144         // we were already notified that the value was changed
00145         // nothing to do, neither validate change nor change value
00146         return;
00147     }
00148 
00149     // Ok, change my value
00150     valueStr = value_str;
00151 
00152     // Initialised !!
00153     Initialised = true;
00154 
00155     // Ok the value has change, send information back to people
00156     SmartLocker SL_Listeners(Listeners);
00157 
00158     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00159     {
00160         Listeners.GetCurrent()->VariableChanged( this );
00161     }
00162 }

00164 void VariableAttribute::ExtractDataFromXml(xmlNodePtr node)
00165 {
00166 
00167     xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00168     if(attr_name)
00169     {
00170         SetName(SimpleString((const char*)attr_name->children->content));
00171     }
00172 
00173     //child value
00174     SimpleString tmp_value("");
00175     xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00176     for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00177     {
00178         if (cur_node->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE)
00179         {
00180             SimpleString cur_name = (const char*)cur_node->name;
00181             if( cur_name == "description" )
00182             {
00183                 SetDescription(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00184             }
00185             else if( cur_name == "formatDescription" )
00186             {
00187                 SetFormatDescription(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00188             }
00189             else if ( cur_name == "value" )
00190             {
00191                 tmp_value = XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children);
00192                 //vattr->SetValue((const char*)cur_node->children->content);
00193             }
00194             else if ( cur_name == "default" )
00195             {
00196                 SetDefaultValue(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00197             }
00198             else if ( cur_name == "type" )
00199             {
00200                 SetType(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr());
00201             }
00202             else if ( cur_name == "access" )
00203             {
00204                 SimpleString content = XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children);
00205                 if( content == AccessReadStr )
00206                 {
00207                     SetAccessRead();
00208                 }
00209                 else if( content == AccessReadWriteStr )
00210                 {
00211                     SetAccessReadWrite();
00212                 }
00213                 else if( content == AccessConstantStr )
00214                 {
00215                     SetAccessConstant();
00216                 }
00217                 else
00218                 {
00219                     OmiscidError( "Unknow Access kind : %s\n", cur_node->children->content );
00220                 }
00221             }
00222             else OmiscidError( "Unwaited Tag : %s\n", cur_name.GetStr() );
00223         }
00224     }
00225 
00226     SetValue(tmp_value);
00227 }

00259 SimpleString& VariableAttribute::GetValue()
00260 {
00261     if ( Initialised == false )
00262     {
00263         // SimpleString TmpString;
00264         // TmpString = GetName();
00265         // TmpString += " not initialised";
00266         // throw  SimpleException( TmpString );
00267 
00268         // return empty string for uninitialized values
00269         return (SimpleString&)SimpleString::EmptyString;
00270     }
00271     return valueStr;
00272 }

00289 bool VariableAttribute::CanBeModifiedFromInside(ControlServerStatus status) const
00290 {
00291     if ( access == ConstantAccess && status == STATUS_RUNNING )
00292     {
00293         return false;
00294     }
00295     return true;
00296 }
00297 
00298  bool VariableAttribute::CanBeModifiedFromOutside(ControlServerStatus status) const
00299 {
00300     return (access == ReadWriteAccess || (access == ConstantAccess && status != STATUS_RUNNING));
00301 }

00306 bool VariableAttribute::AddListener( VariableAttributeListener * ListenerToAdd )
00307 {
00308     if ( ListenerToAdd == NULL )
00309     {
00310         return false;
00311     }
00312 
00313     SmartLocker SL_Listeners(Listeners);
00314 
00315     // look if it is already there..
00316     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00317     {
00318         if ( Listeners.GetCurrent() == ListenerToAdd )
00319         {
00320             return false;
00321         }
00322     }
00323 
00324     // add it
00325     Listeners.Add( ListenerToAdd );
00326 
00327     return true;
00328 }
00329 
00333 bool VariableAttribute::RemoveListener( VariableAttributeListener *  ListenerToAdd )
00334 {
00335     bool ret;
00336 
00337     if ( ListenerToAdd == NULL )
00338     {
00339         return false;
00340     }
00341 
00342     // Remove it if any
00343     SmartLocker SL_Listeners(Listeners);
00344 
00345     ret = Listeners.Remove(ListenerToAdd);
00346 
00347     return ret;
00348 }

00350 unsigned int VariableAttribute::GetNumberOfListeners()
00351 {
00352     unsigned int ret;
00353 
00354     SmartLocker SL_Listeners(Listeners);
00355 
00356     ret = Listeners.GetNumberOfElements();
00357 
00358     return ret;
00359 }
